content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace 1 at position (x=-14.0, y=-49.0) with coal fuel and iron ore input.
- Stone Furnace 2 at position (x=-12.0, y=-48.0) with coal fuel and iron ore input.
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-13.5, y=-47.5) transferring items between furnaces and wooden chests.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-46.5) storing iron plates.
- Wooden Chest at position (x=-13.5, y=-44.5) storing iron plates.
- Transport Belts connecting furnaces and chests for item movement.

### Electricity Generator at Position (x=-7.0, y=23.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position (x=-3.5, y=23.5).
- Boiler at position (x=-7.0, y=23.5) fueled by coal.
- Offshore Pump at position (x=-9.5, y=24.5) supplying water.
- Pipe network connecting the offshore pump to the boiler.

### Iron Ore Mining and Transport System
Consists of:
- Burner Inserter at position (x=-14.5, y=-45.5) waiting for source items.
- Transport Belts for moving mined iron ore to furnaces.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using inserters without source items
- Ensure that the source entity for inserters has items available for transfer to avoid idle inserters.

### Errors due to lack of inventory items
- Before attempting to insert items into entities, verify that the required items are available in your inventory to prevent operation failures.

### Errors with inserters waiting for space in destination
- Ensure that the destination entity has enough space to accept items from inserters to avoid blocking the production line.

### Errors due to inserters being out of fuel
- Regularly refuel burner inserters to maintain continuous operation and avoid production halts.
